name: tool-suite
description: A comprehensive suite of PDF manipulation tools built with modern web technologies
author: Tool Suite Team

scripts.dev: echo 'Starting Tool Suite development environment...' && echo 'Backend: cd packages/backend && npm run dev' && echo 'Merge PDF: cd apps/merge-pdf-react && npm run dev' && echo 'Compress PDF: cd apps/compress-pdf-react && npm run dev'
scripts.install:all: npm install && cd packages/backend && npm install && cd ../../apps/merge-pdf-react && npm install && cd ../compress-pdf-react && npm install
scripts.build:all: cd apps/merge-pdf-react && npm run build && cd ../compress-pdf-react && npm run build
scripts.lint: echo 'Linting all projects...' && cd apps/merge-pdf-react && npm run lint && cd ../compress-pdf-react && npm run lint
scripts.test: echo 'Running tests...' && cd packages/backend && npm test 2>/dev/null || echo 'No tests configured'
